overview: "Nütuayin Mapu", which in Mapuche language means "Let's recover our land", is a documentary about the Mapuche conflict and the struggle of the Revolutionary Peasant Movement and the inhabitants of Camp Lautaro, who in the face of the precarious Chilean legislation seek to recover the ancestral land that belongs to them through the displacement of fences and land seizure.
title: Nütuayin Mapu
